message.body: Yo, why is dinner $81 without drinks? What is this place?
How much would you like it to be?
Lol. I'd like to know what I'm paying for. Is it a set menu? An estimation? I don't really care if he gets drinks. He shouldn't be drinking anyway

Google the place for menu. Just an estimate. Its like fogo. Its outlined exactly what the 35 goes towards. Only a small amount of that is expected to go to drinks unless we go far over our expected number of guests
